content=The Harbour Fish bar  Plockton's premier, and only, traditional Scottish take away. Suppers: fish (locally caught), Chicken, Stornoway Black pudding, etc. seating outside

There are many B&Bs from £15pp upwards and also self-catering cottages.  For those on a budget there is the station bunkhouse from  £8.50pp.
